name: INFINITE POWER
description:
Hold tight to your battery and race to win. This will involve a lot of parkour, shooting robots, and even dimension-hopping.

In one moment, you need to go as far as you can. If your battery gets too low, you can recharge it in the inverted world, but be careful of the inhabitants there.

[WARNING: LOTS OF NEON]

Credits:
Sound effects from https://freesound.org/
Musics:
''Everlasting'' and ''Bright'' from kbeatz
"Fade" from Jazzmania Beat
"Ex/DNDB" from  Techtheist
